languages.text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: Occluding Sphere is immune to all damage and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals direct damage to it.

The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

languages.text: Сфера ограждения невосприимчива к любому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} и к большинству обычных эффектов. Она получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g} только при смерти существ, находящихся под ее контролем.
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: Сфера ограждения невосприимчива к любому урону и к большинству обычных эффектов. Она получает прямой урон только при смерти существ, находящихся под ее контролем.
Сфера ограждения невосприимчива к любому урону и к большинству обычных эффектов. Она получает прямой урон только при смерти существ, находящихся под ее контролем.

languages.text: オクルーディング・スフィアには、あらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}や大抵の一般的効果に対する免疫がある。その支配下にある生物の死は、それに{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: オクルーディング・スフィアには、あらゆるダメージや大抵の一般的効果に対する免疫がある。その支配下にある生物の死は、それに直接ダメージを与える。

languages.text: 遮蔽力场免疫所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与绝大部分常见效果。受到遮蔽力场影响的生物死亡时，遮蔽力场会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: 遮蔽力场免疫所有伤害与绝大部分常见效果。受到遮蔽力场影响的生物死亡时，遮蔽力场会受到直击伤害。

languages.text: La esfera de Oclusión es inmune a todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y a la mayoría de efectos comunes. La muerte de criaturas bajo su control le inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: La esfera de Oclusión es inmune a todo el daño y a la mayoría de efectos comunes. La muerte de criaturas bajo su control le inflige daño directo.

languages.text: Unterdrückungssphäre ist immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und die meisten gewöhnlichen Effekte. Der Tod von Kreaturen untre ihrer Kontrolle fügt ihr {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: Unterdrückungssphäre ist immun gegen jeglichen Schaden und die meisten gewöhnlichen Effekte. Der Tod von Kreaturen in ihrer Kontrolle verursacht bei ihr Direktschaden.

languages.text: La sphère d'inhibition est invulnérable à tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et aux effets les plus courants. La mort des créatures qu'elle contrôle lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.

traits.locale_text: La Sphère d'Inhibition est invulnérable à tous les dégâts et aux effets les plus courants. La mort des créatures qu'elle contrôle lui inflige des dégâts directs.

languages.text: Önleyici Küre, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} türlerine ve çoğu yaygın etkiye karşı bağışıktır. Kontrolü altındaki yaratıkların ölümü, ona {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: The Occluding Sphere is immune to all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and most common effects. Death of creatures under its control deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to it.
